name: .LOCKMYPIX File Extension
summary: Learn about .LOCKMYPIX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open LOCKMYPIX files with LockMyPix on an Android or iOS device. You can unlock the vault using a password, PIN, fingerprint, or face recognition, depending on your device and app settings.
